features: NATURAL BOTANICAL SKIN TONER: Hyalogic’s Alcohol Free Toner gently hydrates, soothes and softens the skin while leaving you with a clean, supple feel. This Moisturizing Toner cleanses, tones and moisturizes with Hyaluronic Acid, witch hazel extract and Aloe Vera. Cleanse and refresh your skin without stripping its natural moisture.

NATURAL ASTRINGENT: This Hazel Witch Toner has a therapeutic effect, rejuvenating dry and sensitive skin. Witch Hazel will leave your skin looking smoother with a brighter complexion. Apply with a cotton pad to face with gentle upward strokes to leave skin feeling fresh and clean without any dryness or stinging. Add this Hyalogic product to your daily face care routine.

HYALURONIC ACID: This Witch Hazel Alcohol Free Skin Toner for Face is enriched with Hyaluronic Acid (HA), a natural and vital element to healthy skin and is nature’s greatest natural hydrator! This Health and Beauty Skin Care Product is good for all types of skin, especially as a Face Toner for Aging Skin!

CRUELTY-FREE: This Vegan Face Toner is also Paraben-free, Gluten Free and Fragrance Free. This hydrating toner is great for prepping your skin for a moisturizer, as an excellent makeup refresher or as a midday pick-me-up.

MOISTURIZING TONER: Applying their high standards for quality and efficacy, the founders at Hyalogic set out to ensure that all their skin care products would be beneficial, safe and stable. The key players in Hyalogic’s Hyaluronic Acid Toner are Hyaluronic Acid (HA) and Aloe Vera.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hyaluronic Acid Toner w/ Witch Hazel & Aloe Vera, Alcohol-Free, 8 Fl oz Hyalogic’s Alcohol-Free Toner gently hydrates, soothes, and softens the skin while leaving you with a clean, supple feel. This Moisturizing Toner cleanses, tones, and moisturizes with Hyaluronic Acid, witch hazel extract, and Aloe Vera. Hyaluronic Acid (HA) is a natural and vital element of healthy, supple skin. HA is nature’s greatest natural hydrator for your skin! Cautions: Store at room temperature. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Ingredients: Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Glycerin (Vegetable), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower (Matricaria) (Chamomile) Extract, Camelia Sinensis Leaf (Green Tea) Extract, Palmaria Palmata (Seaweed) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, and Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid). Gluten-Free, Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free, and Fragrance-Free. Directions: Apply to a cotton pad and sweep gently over face after cleansing with Hyalogic's Facial Cleanser, avoiding around the eye area. Use morning and night to support skin tone, texture, and clarity. For best results, follow up with one of our Hyalogic face serums.

Natural Botanical Skin Toner Hyalogic’s Alcohol-Free Toner gently hydrates, soothes, and softens the skin while leaving you with a clean, supple feel. This Moisturizing Toner cleanses, tones, and moisturizes with Hyaluronic Acid, witch hazel extract, and Aloe Vera. Cleanse and refresh your skin without stripping its natural moisture.

5 Elements of Hydration When speaking of hydration, we typically think about quenching our thirst. But full-body hydration means so much more- including supporting your critical physical structures and organs that require plentiful hydration to function at their best. Your joints, eyes, skin, hair, and gums all require sufficient levels of moisture to do their jobs properly.
Gentle & Hydrating Maintenance Hyalogic’s Facial Toner soothes & softens the skin, leaving you with a clean, supple feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and effectiveness!
reviews.reviewText: Love this facial toner!!! I’ve been using it daily for several years and it has helped with fine lines and elasticity. I also love that it has more body, it’s slightly thicker, so you can put a small puddle in your palm and use it to cover your face, neck and décolletage without wasting any. No cotton balls necessary.All In all it’s a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizing toner
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizers face and does not leave dry or feeling stripped of all the oils.
Love it. I use this after a cleanser. It does not sting my skin as I've experienced that with other toners. It makes my face feel and look super clean. It's my definite go to.
